Question: Caesar seized the Egyptian capital and imposed himself as arbiter between the rival claims of Ptolemy and this person.
Hints: It seems that in reality Antony wanted this person’s promise to support his intended war against the Parthians.
Schaefer and his toxicologist Dietrich Mebs decided this person used a mixture of hemlock, wolfsbane and opium.
This person tore off her clothes and covered him with them.
